import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Change ticket issue type"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/{ticketId}/issue"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates the issue type for a ticket. Use this to re-categorize tickets when the initial issue classification was incorrect or needs refinement.

**Prerequisites**
- Obtain available issues from [POST /api/v1.0/issues](/docs/api/issues/search-issues) or [GET /api/v1.0/issues](/docs/api/issues/list-issues)
- Extract the `IssueId` for the desired issue type

**Workflow Example**
1. Search issues: [POST /api/v1.0/issues](/docs/api/issues/search-issues) → select appropriate `IssueId`
2. Update ticket issue: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/issue](/docs/api/tickets/change-ticket-issue)

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"ticketId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Unique identifier of the ticket to update","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"description":"Issue update request containing the new issue identifier","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request payload for changing a ticket's issue type/category.","properties":{"TicketId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier of the ticket to update. Must match the `ticketId` path parameter.","example":"260b8773-dcad-f011-8e61-000d3a7bb518"},"IssueId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"New issue type identifier to assign to the ticket. Obtain valid values from GET /api/v1.0/issues.","example":"b87f2fbb-4db7-e611-80ff-000c29ab80b0","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"listIssues","endpoint":"GET /api/v1.0/issues","responseField":"Items[].IssueId"}}},"required":["TicketId","IssueId"],"example":{"TicketId":"260b8773-dcad-f011-8e61-000d3a7bb518","IssueId":"b87f2fbb-4db7-e611-80ff-000c29ab80b0"},"title":"SetTicketIssueRequest"},"example":{"IssueId":"b87f2fbb-4db7-e611-80ff-000c29ab80b0","AutoUpdateSubject":true,"TriggerOnUpdated":true,"TicketId":"0466a7fd-6dab-ef11-88cf-6045bdb6b1c8","IssueCategoryId":"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
